nodes.description: 拉合尔邦德路发生卡车炸弹袭击，造成1人死亡、24人受伤
nodes.support_text: Share: LAHORE - A man died and two dozen others were wounded when a massive truck bomb ripped through Lahore’s Bund Road on Monday night.

nodes.description: 爆炸导致附近电网站受损，引发大面积停电
nodes.support_text: A major portion of the district plunged into darkness as the blast triggered power breakdown.

nodes.description: 救援人员在爆炸现场发现20英尺宽、6英尺深的坑洞
nodes.support_text: Rescue workers said there was a '20 feet wide and 6-feet deep carter' at the site of the explosion.

nodes.description: 一名女童从倒塌建筑残骸中获救，送医时情况危重
nodes.support_text: We recovered a child from the debris of a nearby building that flattened following the blast.

nodes.description: 现场发现被炸毁的卡车残骸，部分部件散落数百米外
nodes.support_text: A rescue worker told this reporter that there was a '20 feet wide and 6-feet deep carter' at the site of the explosion.

nodes.description: 当地居民称爆炸导致自家房屋墙体开裂
nodes.support_text: The blast was so powerful that it caused cracks in the two-storey house where he lives.

nodes.description: 一辆载有水果的卡车被怀疑装有爆炸物
nodes.support_text: A rescue worker told this reporter that there was a '20 feet wide and 6-feet deep carter' at the site of the explosion.

nodes.description: 警方和军警在拉合尔开展大规模安全清查
nodes.support_text: Authorities sealed off the locality to help rescuers operate smoothly.

nodes.description: 救援队持续作业至次日凌晨，仍有人员被困废墟
nodes.support_text: Rescue operation was underway at the site till filing of this report.

nodes.description: 民调显示10名伤者住院，10人经急救后出院，2人转院
nodes.support_text: Out of 22 total victims, 10 injured are admitted to our hospital. Ten others were discharged after first aid. Two patients are referred to the main Mayo hospital.

nodes.description: 拉合尔电务公司确认爆炸导致电路严重损毁
nodes.support_text: Our field staff is there to fix the problem.

nodes.description: 部分媒体被禁止进入封锁现场，用钢板隔离
nodes.support_text: Media crews were denied access to the blast site that was closed with the help of steel sheets.

nodes.description: 省首席部长要求提交爆炸事件详细调查报告
nodes.support_text: Earlier, Lahore’s chief traffic officer visited the site and told reporters that the counter terrorism department will determine nature of the blast.

nodes.description: DIG向《国民报》说明情况
nodes.support_text: DIG向《国民报》说明情况

nodes.description: 正在寻找卡车司机
nodes.support_text: 正在寻找卡车司机

nodes.description: 救援人员向记者报告发现20英尺宽、6英尺深的坑洞
nodes.support_text: Rescue worker told this reporter that there was a '20 feet wide and 6-feet deep carter' at the site of the explosion.

nodes.description: 爆炸震碎附近建筑窗户
nodes.support_text: 爆炸震碎附近建筑窗户

nodes.description: 政府大楼部分受损
nodes.support_text: 政府大楼部分受损

nodes.description: 受害者因砖块和玻璃击中受伤
nodes.support_text: 受害者因砖块和玻璃击中受伤

nodes.description: 受害者被砖块和玻璃击中
nodes.support_text: 受害者被砖块和玻璃击中

nodes.description: 爆炸使省城摇晃
nodes.support_text: 爆炸使省城摇晃

nodes.description: 总理被罢免
nodes.support_text: 总理被罢免

nodes.description: 总理预计到达家乡
nodes.support_text: 总理预计到达家乡

nodes.description: 总理领导集会
nodes.support_text: 总理领导集会

nodes.description: Punjab首席部长Shehbaz Sharif命令省级警察局长采取行动
nodes.support_text: Punjab首席部长命令省级警察局长

nodes.description: 省级警察局长向Punjab首席部长提交详细报告
nodes.support_text: 省级警察局长返回详细报告

edges.support_text: A major portion of the district plunged into darkness as the blast triggered power breakdown.
Rescue workers said there was a '20 feet wide and 6-feet deep carter' at the site of the explosion.
We recovered a child from the debris of a nearby building that flattened following the blast.
A rescue worker told this reporter that there was a '20 feet wide and 6-feet deep carter' at the site of the explosion.
The blast was so powerful that it caused cracks in the two-storey house where he lives.
A rescue worker told this reporter that there was a '20 feet wide and 6-feet deep carter' at the site of the explosion.
Authorities sealed off the locality to help rescuers operate smoothly.
Rescue operation was underway at the site till filing of this report.
Out of 22 total victims, 10 injured are admitted to our hospital.
Our field staff is there to fix the problem.
Media crews were denied access to the blast site that was closed with the help of steel sheets.
Earlier, Lahore’s chief traffic officer visited the site and told reporters that the counter terrorism department will determine nature of the blast.
DIG向《国民报》说明情况
爆炸震碎附近建筑窗户发生在卡车炸弹袭击后
政府大楼受损发生在爆炸后
受害者受伤发生在爆炸后
受害者被击中发生在爆炸后
爆炸发生前已确认省城摇晃
爆炸事件后总理被罢免
爆炸事件后总理预计到达家乡
爆炸事件后总理领导集会
倒塌建筑引发救援行动
正在寻找卡车司机
